import React from'react';/*
Challenge: Build the Card component
For now, hard-code in the data (like 
the rating, title, price, etc.)

Notes:
- Only render 1 instance (I already did this for you)
- The star icon and photo (katie-zaferes.png) are in the images 
  folder for your use
- Make sure to include:
    - image
    - star icon (star.png), rating, and review count
    - title
    - cost/person
- The main purpose of this challenge is to show you where our limitations
  currently are, so don't worry about the fact that you're hard-coding all
  this data into the component.
*/import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Card(props){let badgeText;if(props.openSpots===0)badgeText='SOLD OUT';else if(props.location.toLowerCase()==='online')badgeText='ONLINE';return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card--background",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:props.img,className:"card--background-img",alt:"background of card"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card--background-status",children:badgeText})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card--review",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card--review-stars",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"./images/star.svg",className:"card--review-star",alt:"star"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"card--review-stars-amount",children:props.starsAmount})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"card--review-amount",children:["(",props.reviewsAmout,")"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"card--review-spliter",children:"."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"card--review-country",children:props.country})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"card--title",children:props.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"card--price",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["From ",props.price," "]}),"/ ",props.measure]})]});}

sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; /* Challenge: Build the Card component For now, hard-code in the data (like the rating, title, price, etc.) Notes: - Only render 1 instance (I already did this for you) - The star icon and photo (katie-zaferes.png) are in the images folder for your use - Make sure to include: - image - star icon (star.png), rating, and review count - title - cost/person - The main purpose of this challenge is to show you where our limitations currently are, so don't worry about the fact that you're hard-coding all this data into the component. */ export default function Card(props) { let badgeText; if (props.openSpots === 0) badgeText = 'SOLD OUT'; else if (props.location.toLowerCase() === 'online') badgeText = 'ONLINE'; return (
{badgeText}

{props.starsAmount}

({props.reviewsAmout})

.

{props.country}

{props.title}

From {props.price} / {props.measure}

); }
